attributes.action: allow red arrows to open 2012 olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having read that the Red Arrows are not to be allowed to perform at the opening ceremony of the 2012 Olympics as they are too British and may offend other nationalties why did we bother to even try to win the Olympics being in Britain in the first place if we are not allowed to fly the flag.  Please sign if you would like them to be able to do this

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
